about.title: About John Doe
about.description: I'm a paragraph. Click here to add your own text and edit me. It’s easy. Just click “Edit Text” or double click me to add your own content and make changes to the font. Feel free to drag and drop me anywhere you like on your page. I’m a great place for you to tell a story and let your users know a little more about you.

item-0.question: What is an FAQ section?
item-0.answer: An FAQ section is a collection of common questions and answers related to a specific topic.

item-1.question: Why do FAQs matter?
item-1.answer: FAQs help users find answers to common questions quickly, improving user experience.

item-2.question: Where can I add my FAQs?
item-2.answer: You can add FAQs to your website, app, or documentation to assist users.

item-3.question: How do I add a new question & answer?
item-3.answer: You can add new questions and answers by editing your FAQ section in your CMS or code.

item-4.question: Can I insert an image, video, or GIF in my FAQ?
item-4.answer: Yes, you can embed media like images, videos, or GIFs to make your FAQ more engaging.

item-5.question: How do I edit or remove the 'Frequently Asked Questions' title?
item-5.answer: You can edit or remove the title by modifying the corresponding text in your code or CMS.
